input.sentences: as soon as he sat down i knew class would be extremely boring today .
then another speaker came in | and i could n't even remember what she spoke about .
they had us all engage in pretend business meetings for class .
then they gave a presentation of how business work .
afterwards | one last speaker came and we were freed from business class prison .
output.sentences: We attended a business conference with work.
Then we were divided into tasks to do small challenges.
Our team did a presentation afterwards to discuss our conclusions to the challenge.
Then the main speaker rounded up the day.
